forgot.BODY: Enter your account's email address to reset your password.

email.LABEL: Email Address
email.INVALID: This field must be a valid email address.

password.LABEL: Password
password.TOO-SHORT: Passwords must be at least 8 characters.

confirm.LABEL: Confirm Password
confirm.PLACEHOLDER: Must be the same as above
confirm.INVALID: This password must match the above password.

verify.VERIFY: We have sent a code via {{ type }} to {{ value }}. Please input the code you received here:

code.REQUIRED: Please enter the code you received.

modal.TITLE: API Response Error
modal.BODY: Error contacting {{ domainUrl }}, confirm that the domain is pointing to the correct IP address. If that is correct, please check the troubleshooting documentation.

license_expired.TITLE: License Expired
license_expired.BODY: This SynergyCP instance's license key has expired. Please renew your license using the billing panel. If your license has already been renewed or did not expire, please check the troubleshooting documentation.
